master.description: The URL of the Mesos master. The format is a comma-delimited list of hosts like zk://host1:port,host2:port/mesos. If using ZooKeeper, pay particular attention to the leading zk:// and trailing /mesos! If not using ZooKeeper, standard host:port patterns, like localhost:5050 or 10.0.0.5:5050,10.0.0.6:5050, are also acceptable.

assets-path.description: Set a local file system path to load assets from, instead of loading them from the packaged jar.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each Ingestion instance.

instances.description: Number of Ingestion instances to run.

hostname.description: The advertised hostname stored in ZooKeeper so another standby host can redirect to this elected leader (default = localhost)

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each Ingestion instance.
